select prm.PromotionID,prm.PromotionType,prm.WID,prm.WCode,prm.WName,prm.PromotionName,prm.BeginTime,prm.EndTime,prm.Status,prm.ConfTime,prm.ConfUserID,prm.ConfUserName,prm.PostingTime,prm.PostingUserID,prm.PostingUserName,prm.Remark,prm.CreateTime,prm.CreateUserID,prm.CreateUserName,prm.ModifyTime,prm.ModifyUserID,prm.ModifyUserName FROM WProductPromotion as prm WHERE EXISTS({0})

SELECT TOP 1 n.ShopID,n.ShopCode, n.productID,n.SKU,m.PromotionID FROM(SELECT s.ShopID,s.ShopCode,d.productID,d.SKU FROM WProductPromotion p INNER JOIN WProductPromotionShops s ON p.PromotionID=s.PromotionID INNER JOIN WProductPromotionDetails d ON p.PromotionID=d.PromotionID WHERE p.PromotionType=2 AND p.WID=@WID AND p.PromotionID=@PromotionID group by s.ShopID,s.ShopCode,d.productID,d.SKU) n INNER JOIN (SELECT ShopID,productID,p.PromotionID FROM WProductPromotion p INNER JOIN WProductPromotionShops s ON p.PromotionID=s.PromotionID INNER JOIN WProductPromotionDetails d ON p.PromotionID=d.PromotionID WHERE p.PromotionType=2 AND p.WID=@WID AND p.PromotionID!=@PromotionID AND (p.Status =1 OR p.Status=2) group by s.ShopID,d.ProductID,p.PromotionID) m ON n.ShopID=m.ShopID AND n.ProductID=m.ProductID

DECLARE @BeginTime DATETIME; DECLARE @EndTime DATETIME; SET @BeginTime = (SELECT begintime FROM WProductPromotion WHERE PromotionID=@PromotionID); SET @EndTime =(SELECT endtime FROM WProductPromotion WHERE PromotionID=@PromotionID); SELECT TOP 1 n.ShopID,n.ShopCode, n.productID,n.SKU,m.PromotionID FROM(SELECT ts.ShopID,ts.ShopCode,td.productID,td.SKU FROM WProductPromotion tp INNER JOIN WProductPromotionShops ts ON tp.PromotionID=ts.PromotionID INNER JOIN WProductPromotionDetails td ON tp.PromotionID=td.PromotionID WHERE tp.PromotionType=1 AND tp.WID=@WID AND tp.PromotionID=@PromotionID group by ts.ShopID,ts.ShopCode,td.productID,td.SKU) n INNER JOIN (SELECT ShopID,productID,p.PromotionID FROM WProductPromotion p INNER JOIN WProductPromotionShops s ON p.PromotionID=s.PromotionID INNER JOIN WProductPromotionDetails d ON p.PromotionID=d.PromotionID WHERE p.PromotionType=1 AND p.WID=@WID AND p.PromotionID!=@PromotionID AND (p.Status =1 OR p.Status=2) AND ((p.BeginTime<=@BeginTime AND p.EndTime>=@BeginTime OR p.BeginTime<=@EndTime AND p.EndTime>=@EndTime) OR (p.BeginTime>=@BeginTime AND p.BeginTime<=@EndTime OR p.EndTime>=@BeginTime AND p.EndTime<=@EndTime)) group by s.ShopID,d.ProductID,p.PromotionID) m ON n.ShopID=m.ShopID AND n.ProductID=m.ProductID
